English: Shenglei, the earliest Chinese rime dictionary with 11,520 single-character entries, released in 3rd century (was not preserved to this day)

d.f: `聲韻學~`上~`指~`聲母~，`為~`形聲~`字~`的~`聲符~。

English: Shenglei, the earliest Chinese rime dictionary with 11,520 single-character entries, released in 3rd century (was not preserved to this day)
